Class TourDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.nure.koren.summaryTask4.db.dao.AbstractDao
      • ua.nure.koren.summaryTask4.db.dao.TourDao

  • public class TourDao
extends AbstractDao
    DAO for Tour. Provides connection between entity tour and tours table in travel_agency DB

    2019-11-19
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    E.Koren
